about_the_game:
Description

OhShape is a rhythm VR game where players dance with their full body to go through, punch, and dodge walls following the beat of the music. Enjoy this immersive game for all types of players, inspired by the Japanese TV show Hole in the Wall.

Introducing OhShape Ultimate!

Enjoy this celebrated VR rhythm game that offers a unique way of moving your whole body, a renewed look, and lots of extra content for this new era!

In 2024, we are celebrating our 5-year anniversary, and to start with, we are releasing a new fitness album💥🏋️‍♂️!

In addition to the classic wall-punching, obstacle-dodging, and fun pose-making, get your full-body cardio workout with 6 new sessions and 2 difficulty levels, designed to make you sweat and engage every part of your body!

Jump into this fun-filled VR fitness album with OhShape by Odders Lab🤸

Key Features

OhShape is a rhythm game offering a unique way of moving your whole body. Dodge obstacles, punch walls, and make fun poses to get through each map. Play with the coins and be the star of your own show! Here are the features of OhShape Ultimate:

  • Fun poses and catchy music to keep you moving

  • Modern & dynamic looks and a much friendlier onboarding for new users.

  • Fun and great workout for your whole body

  • A great gateway into the VR rhythm world but also a real challenge for the most seasoned players.

  • More than 40 stages with 4 difficulty levels

  • Electro Party DLC now for free

  • Party Mode: play and compete with your friends and family

  • Practice Mode: Practice level sections to perfection!

  • Custom songs support with a very easy-to-use level editor

  • Cross-platform online leaderboard



    Jump right into this new and fresh OhShape experience, and let us know your thoughts!





    OhShape Level EditorHere you can download the Level Editor. As it's open source, you can also download the code on GitHub.


    OhShape F.A.Q.

    Reviews"It’s a smart, straight, no-nonsense rhythm game with an energetic core mechanic and plenty of options to tailor the experience to your liking".
    - Upload VR

    "OhShape is just as much a game of mental prowess as it is physical endurance. Focus on your head hole and let the rest of the information wash over you (...) It's a really rewarding grind, and a crazy good work out".
    - The Gamer

    "OhShape is a fun, fast-paced, rhythm game with fantastic fitness potential. The wall mechanics—both cutout poses and overlapping walls that must be avoided completely—combine with punch obstacles to provide a comprehensive range of movement potential".
    - VR Fitness Insider

    "OhShape is a well-designed rhythm game that comes the closest yet to being a serious fitness experience in VR".
    - 6DOF


    Awesome gameplays

name: OhShape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: OhShape is a rhythm VR game where players dance with their full body to go through, punch, and dodge walls following the beat of the music. Enjoy this immersive game for all types of players, inspired by the Japanese TV show Hole in the Wall.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
